channel.title: Server Console?
channel.description:
I'm trying to find something like a console where i can run the server and have a console that i can use to restart server, talk to people, kick people?
Like a call of duty Rcon but just with talk kick restart
I saw it on some sources but didn't know how.
When you click run the console thing opens with the cmd prompt
can anyone help me with this? :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2009, 06:19:51 pm[/size][hr]If you could instead of posting here could you PM it to me? this topic might get lost by the time i get back on in 2 hours :D
